queries.query: select * from pharmacies where LOWER(partial_postcode) = LOWER($1)
queries.description: Find pharmacies using just a partial postcode  (e.g. CH64, or L1)
queries.name: partial_postcode

queries.query: select * from pharmacies where LOWER(organisation_name) ILIKE '%' || LOWER($1) || '%'
queries.name: name
